meanings.definition: A medication used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed enalapril to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: She takes enalapril every day to manage her heart condition.
meanings.sent3: The enalapril bottle danced on the shelf, ready to tackle high blood pressure.
meanings.sent4: Enalapril is like a shield, protecting the heart from the dangers of high blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: The red enalapril pills gleamed, promising to keep the heart healthy.

meanings.definition: To administer enalapril to a patient.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will enalapril the patient before breakfast.
meanings.sent2: Doctors enalapril the medication carefully to ensure proper dosage.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to enalapril the dog, thinking it would help.
meanings.sent4: She enalapriled the situation, hoping it would improve.
meanings.sent5: Enalapriling the patient, the doctor explained the benefits of the medication.
